<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82130</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82130</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4807</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Publishing -- Making a Book</string>
            <string language="es">Publicación – Hacer un libro</string>
            <string language="ga">Foilsiú – Leabhar a Dhéanamh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Veröffentlichen -- Bilden eines Buches</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Édition -- fabrication d'un livre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Publicar -- fazendo um livro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pubblicazione -- fare un libro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έκδοση -- που κάνει ένα βιβλίο</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson introducing the structure of a book and encouraging children to assemble a book of their own writing.</string>
            <string language="es">Una lección que introduce la estructura de un libro y anima a los niños a ensamblar un libro que hayan escrito ellos mismos.</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceacht ar struchtúr leabhar agus a spreagann na leanaí leabhar dá saothar féin a chur le chéile.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="es">plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Lektion, welche die Struktur eines Buches 
und Kinder vorstellt, um ein Buch ihres eigenen Schreibens 
zusammenzubauen anregt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une leçon présentant la structure d'un livre et
encourageant des enfants pour assembler un livre de leur propre 
écriture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma lição que introduz a estrutura de um livro 
e que incentiva crianças para montar um livro de sua própria 
escrita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una lezione che introduce la struttura di un 
libro e che consiglia ai bambini per montare un libro della loro 
propria scrittura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα μάθημα που εισάγει τη δομή ενός βιβλίου και που 
ενθαρρύνει τα παιδιά για να συγκεντρώσει ένα βιβλίο του 
γραψίματός τους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.
